steps.name: Given I login to RAVS and set vaccinator details with NEELIMA HOUSE and Care Home and get patient details for 9470057589 with option 3 and choose to vaccinate with vaccine details as COVID-19, Comirnaty 3 Omicron XBB.1.5, SDYY2-13A with 19/10/2026
And I search for a patient with the NHS number in the find a patient screen
And I open the patient record by clicking on patient ROGER SEABORNE
When I click choose vaccine button and choose the COVID-19, Comirnaty 3 Omicron XBB.1.5, SDYY2-13A with 19/10/2026 and click continue
And I assess the patient's yes with the details and date as today-2 and click continue to record consent screen button
And I record yes with the details and click continue to vaccinate button
And I record yes details and date as today-1 and click Continue to Check and confirm screen
Then I need to be able to see the patient ROGER SEABORNE, 13/12/1922, 10 ANN STREET, DALTON-IN-FURNESS, CUMBRIA, LA15 8BG and vaccination details on the check and confirm screen
And when I click confirm and save button, the immunisation history of the patient should be updated in the patient details page
